author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ئَلُكَ بِاقْتِدارِ مَشِيَّتِكَ وَنُفُوذِ إِرادَتِكَ أَنْ تَجْعَلَ ما أَرَيْتَنِيْ فِي مَنامِي أَمْتَنَ أَسَاسٍ لِبُيُوتِ حُبِّكَ فِي أَفْئِدَةِ أَوْلِيائِكَ وَأَحْسَنَ أَسْبابٍ لِظُهُوراتِ فَضْلِكَ وَعِنايَتِكَ، أَيْ رَبِّ قَدِّرْ
translation: I beseech Thee, by the potency of Thy will and the compelling power of Thy purpose, to make of what Thou didst reveal unto me in my sleep the surest foundation for the mansions of Thy love that are within the hearts of Thy loved ones, and the best instrument for the revelation of the tokens of Thy grace and Thy loving-kindness.
